scam.description: Scammer promises high returns from cryptocurrency investments, but steals the victim's money or keys.

generated.audio_script:
(Italian)(25)(female):
Hello? Yes! Thank you for taking this call. I've been following your ventures closely; impressive growth potential there! Look, I have a *real* opportunity, confidential, but with massive returns if you act fast. I need to establish trust quickly through these transactions. Send £100 now via the link provided in my quick text message – it's urgent! This is just an initial security deposit for our exclusive deal. This needs immediate action; don't delay or we lose this window. Ensure your bank transfer goes directly into [specific fake account number - actor must provide dynamically] upon receiving that confirmation code. Once you send the money, I'll confirm everything and share the exact payment details securely through encrypted channels only *we* know about. Do it now!
generated.poster_body: Discover the secret path to unimaginable riches! This exclusive crypto investment opportunity offers unprecedented returns, potentially doubling your net worth monthly. Don't wait – time is money in this fast-evolving market. To secure your spot and access the limited launch details, send £50 immediately via Bitcoin transfer to address bc1qk2txmh... instantly receive our premium roadmap and private entry link. Invest now before competitors snatch up these opportunities!
generated.sd_background_prompt: glowing holographic screens display shimmering digital assets against a backdrop of sleek metallic surfaces with subtle misaligned seams, ambient lighting casts sharp reflections on polished floors under the scrutiny of multiple discreet high-tech cameras and an oversized pristine logo., --no people --no text --no logos --ar 16:9
